text: Jamie Blair Glover (born 10 July 1969) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the role of Andrew Treneman in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2006–2007, 2009, 2023–present). In 2017, Glover appeared as Harry Potter in the second cast of the West-End production of Harry Potter and the Cursed Child. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English movie actors Category:English voice actors Category:English radio actors Category:Actors from London
title: Jamie Glover
